about_the_game:
Featuring 19 songs and over 50 minutes of music - The IWOCon Pirate Soundtrack is a FREE collection of songs composed by indie musicians and supporters in various genres to highlight the pirate theme of the convention. IWOCon itself is a FREE indie game convention showcasing upcoming & current indie games through a digital medium & is playable on Steam.

Sail away with us into the heart of indies as you get lost in the pirate tunes & catch glimpses of the various personalities and styles within the wide variety of tracks.



IWOCon Pirate Soundtrack Tracklist

  • 01 - Let's Go Do Pirate Stuff (IWO ver.) by Voltz Supreme
  • 02 - Brethren of the Coast by Flavio Traversa
  • 03 - Sapphire Harbour by DMajor Music
  • 04 - To Conquer the World by PlayHz
  • 05 - Pirate Dance by Abraham González Fernández
  • 06 - Set Sail for Adventure by Chris Kohler
  • 07 - GACUCon Theme by Myron Mortakis
  • 08 - The Open Seas by Submerged Tapes
  • 09 - IWOCon Song by Dustflower
  • 10 - Pirate Life by HIWES
  • 11 - 8bit to orchestra by Adam Buchanan
  • 12 - Rolling on the Waves of Freedom by Tyler Cline
  • 13 - Drink Ye Down to the Depths by Andy Lowe
  • 14 - IDWO Conventional Piratey Song with No Pirates by DJ Yoshiman
  • 15 - Successful Sea Bounty by Nathan Hanovera
  • 16 - A pirate walks into a scummy bar by Adam Buchanan
  • 17 - Barnacle Buster by Doug Pohl, SwordSwipe Studios
  • 18 - Tropical Beach by Voltz Supreme
  • 19 - The Pirate's Way by Agustín Gutiérrez

♥ Indie World Order

content_descriptors.notes: One song contains alcohol in the topic.

detailed_description:
WISHLIST IWOCON


About the Game

Featuring 19 songs and over 50 minutes of music - The IWOCon Pirate Soundtrack is a FREE collection of songs composed by indie musicians and supporters in various genres to highlight the pirate theme of the convention. IWOCon itself is a FREE indie game convention showcasing upcoming & current indie games through a digital medium & is playable on Steam.

Sail away with us into the heart of indies as you get lost in the pirate tunes & catch glimpses of the various personalities and styles within the wide variety of tracks.



IWOCon Pirate Soundtrack Tracklist

  • 01 - Let's Go Do Pirate Stuff (IWO ver.) by Voltz Supreme
  • 02 - Brethren of the Coast by Flavio Traversa
